DOC.brief_summary: The objective of the study is to evaluate the effect of frequency of use with a spacer on asthma control in Dutch patients with asthma during their daily clinical practice over 12 weeks treatment.
DOC.brief_title: Flutiform in Treatment of Patients With Asthma in Daily Clinical Practice.
DOC.criteria: Patients eligible to be prescribed fluticasone/formoterol fixed dose combination as follows: Patients not adequately controlled in inhaled corticosteriods and "as required" inhaled short acting beta 2 agonist or patients already adequately controlled on both an inhaled corticosteriod and a longacting beta 2 agonist. The decision to prescribe fluticasone/formoterol fixed dose combination will precede and be independent of the decision to enroll the patient into the study There are no specific exclusion criteria as this is an observational study
